item.title: Main Deck Cargo Smoke Detector System Detectors – Freighter with Draw-Through Smoke Detection System – Both Detectors Per Smoke Zone Inoperative

remarks.para: Both detectors (loops A and B) per smoke zone may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Procedures are established and used to verify associated smoke zone(s) remains empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits, and

Procedures are established and used to verify two smoke zones immediately forward of the associated smoke zone(s) remains empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits.

note.para: UPS does not carry Fly Away Kits in voided cargo compartments.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Associated smoke zone and two smoke zones immediately forward of the associated smoke zone remain empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "MAIN CARGO DECK SMOKE DET SYS INOP". Enter Item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
